commands.name: az hdinsight application create
commands.summary: Create an application for a HDInsight cluster.
commands.syntax:
az hdinsight application create --cluster-name
                                --name
                                --resource-group
                                --script-action-name
                                --script-uri
                                [--access-mode]
                                [--destination-port]
                                [--disable-gateway-auth {false, true}]
                                [--edgenode-size]
                                [--marketplace-id]
                                [--no-validation-timeout]
                                [--script-parameters]
                                [--ssh-password]
                                [--ssh-public-key]
                                [--ssh-user]
                                [--sub-domain-suffix]
                                [--subnet]
                                [--tags]
                                [--type {CustomApplication, RServer}]
                                [--vnet-name]
examples:
az hdinsight application create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyApplication \
--cluster-name MyCluster \
--script-uri https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/linuxhueconfigactionv02/install-hue-uber-v02.sh \
--script-action-name MyScriptAction \
--script-parameters '"-version latest -port 20000"'

az hdinsight application create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyApplication \
--cluster-name MyCluster \
--script-uri https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/linuxhueconfigactionv02/install-hue-uber-v02.sh \
--script-action-name MyScriptAction \
--script-parameters "-version latest -port 20000" \
--edgenode-size Standard_D4_v2

az hdinsight application create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyApplication \
--cluster-name MyCluster \
--script-uri https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/linuxhueconfigactionv02/install-hue-uber-v02.sh \
--script-action-name MyScriptAction \
--script-parameters "-version latest -port 20000" \
--destination-port 8888 \
--sub-domain-suffix was

commands.name: az hdinsight application delete
commands.summary: Deletes the specified application on the HDInsight cluster.

commands.name: az hdinsight application list
commands.summary: Lists all of the applications for the HDInsight cluster.

commands.name: az hdinsight application show
commands.summary: Gets properties of the specified application.

commands.name: az hdinsight application wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until an operation is complete.
